statements: DELETE FROM astronauts_health WHERE age > 40 AND blood_type = 'O+';
DELETE FROM astronauts_health WHERE astronaut_id = 1 AND blood_type = 'AB';
DELETE FROM astronauts_health WHERE age < 30 AND weight_kg > 70;
DELETE FROM health_records WHERE astronaut_id = 1 AND weight > 80.5;
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE astronaut_id = 2 OR allergies IS NULL;
DELETE FROM health_record WHERE astronaut_id = 3 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM HealthAlerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND astronaut_id = 1;
DELETE FROM Medications WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%' AND astronaut_id = 2;
